content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_planks
inventory=[{"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 13}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "cracked_nether_bricks", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft acacia_planks, I need to place 1 stripped_acacia_wood in the crafting table. The stripped_acacia_wood is located at slot 33, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_planks
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 13}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 57, "index": 21}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "cracked_nether_bricks", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}]
thought: The acacia_planks have been crafted, so I will move them from slot 0 to a free slot in the inventory (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
